question: 系
sourceMnemonic: When you associate with a certain <kanji>lineage</kanji>, you trace yourself back with a group of people. This group of people is your <vocabulary>tribe</vocabulary>, your <vocabulary>lineage</vocabulary>, your <vocabulary>group</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: The reading is the same as what you learned with the kanji, probably because this word gets stuck onto other things to describe tribes and groups.
